title: Forum ban was lifted?
body:
Ayyy! What's happening, friends?

However, Riot, fix your game, alright. I can't play because it wants me to verify my email but I never get the damn email.

replies.body: In regards to your email problems, have you checked your spam/junk (and possibly "deleted") folder? Gotta figure you'd do that, but better to ask and make sure. If you have another email you could use, you could try that and see if that works. If it does, you can then try switching the email back to the current one and see if the verification works then (if you'd prefer it on that email). Beyond that, you're best bet is probably to contact [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (I'd recommend the "I need help with account management, data requests, or deletion" option) regarding the issue.
